assessment_item.title: Assume that there is an unknown planet orbiting around the Sun is located between the Venus and Earth. If the maximum elongation of this planet observed from the Earth is 60o, then the distance of the planet from the Sun in Astronomical unit is
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

Assume that there is an unknown planet orbiting around the Sun is located between the Venus and Earth. If the maximum elongation of this planet observed from the Earth is 60o, then the distance of the planet from the Sun in Astronomical unit is

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

2 Au

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:987"},{"text":"

2 AU

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:988"},{"text":"

\\frac{1}{\\sqrt{2}}AU

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:998"},{"text":"

\\frac{\\sqrt{3}}{2}AU
